data.name: I.O.R.C  Impact Orbital Rescue Crew
data.detailed_description:
High above Earth, some time in the future, a battle rages above between the brave men and women of the Earth Navy, and the powerful robot ships of the Drone fleet. As the battle goes on, broken ships and space debris begin to fall to Earth, a terrible danger to those below.

This, is where YOU come in! As a member of the Impact Orbital Rescue Crew, you'll pilot the Meteor-buster rescue aircraft in attempt to bring that debris down safely before it crashes into the city below!

In this single-player, 2.5D arcade flight game, you will:

Fly, shoot and dodge through 20 action filled levels, including 4 boss stages against massive debris!

Deal with dangerous hazards, from flaming debris to surging electricity and even some debris that fights back!

Use your ship's unique parachute launcher, powerful precision rail-gun and high pressure water cannon to render lethal space debris safe!

Experience the story of rookie pilot Blue!

And, with a little luck, skill, and bravery, Save the Earth!
data.about_the_game:
High above Earth, some time in the future, a battle rages above between the brave men and women of the Earth Navy, and the powerful robot ships of the Drone fleet. As the battle goes on, broken ships and space debris begin to fall to Earth, a terrible danger to those below.

This, is where YOU come in! As a member of the Impact Orbital Rescue Crew, you'll pilot the Meteor-buster rescue aircraft in attempt to bring that debris down safely before it crashes into the city below!

In this single-player, 2.5D arcade flight game, you will:

Fly, shoot and dodge through 20 action filled levels, including 4 boss stages against massive debris!

Deal with dangerous hazards, from flaming debris to surging electricity and even some debris that fights back!

Use your ship's unique parachute launcher, powerful precision rail-gun and high pressure water cannon to render lethal space debris safe!

Experience the story of rookie pilot Blue!

And, with a little luck, skill, and bravery, Save the Earth!
data.short_description: A 2.5D arcade flight game, in which you take the role of a rookie pilot flying a unique rescue aircraft to render dangerous falling space debris safe. Fly through 20 levels including 4 boss stages, and save the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-Processor integrated graphics card compatible with Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated sound card not required
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specs only an estimate. As these are the minimum recommended specs for the engine, this should be enough to run the game though you may need to reduce some settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4ghz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX580 Graphics cards or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated sound card not required
  • Additional Notes: Reccomended settings also an estimate. Game created and primarily tested using a Ryzen 2700x, GTX 1080, PCIE SSD and 8gb ram. On equivalent build it should be fully possible to run the game at full settings.
